item.title: Popular Demand
item.description: You can witness the magic happen on your very own desk, if you’d like. Print out the marker and allow Flash to access your webcam. Click here to watch the magic happen. If you do not know how to allow Flash to access your webcam Follow the instructions below Right click in the black window that opens and select “Settings” Click on “allow” like displayed in the little image below Let the awesomeness overwhelm you like the wondrous fragrance of Lavender on a spring day P.
